review: I love my new amazon fire tv stick! i can't wait to get an amazon prime subscription so I can watch some of the free episodes and movies that they offer. I love to stream and  I love this little usb drive because it doesn't have to have so many wires and cords plugged all the time. I also like it because I can take it with me. Especially if I am waiting at the hospital is nice...

review: Incredibly easy to install and use.  Great portability and fast streaming.  I'd like to have the capability to play local content on USB flash drives or USB portable hard drives via a USB port of the Fire TV Stick.  Hopefully, that feature will be added in the near future.
